summary.span: 表示讀取器，其提供文件類型定義 (DTD)、XML-Data Reduced (XDR) 結構描述，以及 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 驗證。

span.span: Represents a reader that provides document type definition (DTD), XML-Data Reduced (XDR) schema, and XML Schema definition language (XSD) validation.

summary.span: 這個類別已經過時。

span.span: This class is obsolete.

summary.span: 從 .NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議使用 類別及 方法，來建立驗證 XML 讀取器。

span.span: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you use the class and the method to create a validating XML reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlValidatingReader` 實作類別，並提供支援資料驗證。`XmlValidatingReader` implements the class and provides support for data validation. 使用屬性，讓讀取器使用快取的結構描述檔案驗證。Use the property to have the reader validate by using schema files that are cached in an . 屬性會指定讀取器應該執行哪一種驗證。The property specifies what type of validation the reader should perform. 將屬性設定為 ValidationType.None 建立非驗證讀取器。Setting the property to ValidationType.None creates a non-validating reader. 擲回xml 剖析錯誤。 throws an on XML parse errors. 擲回例外狀況之後讀取器的狀態不是可預測的。After an exception is thrown the state of the reader is not predictable. 例如，報告的節點類型可能不同於目前節點的實際節點類型。For example, the reported node type may be different than the actual node type of the current node. 使用屬性來檢查讀取器是否處於錯誤狀態。Use the property to check whether a reader is in error state. > [!NOTE] > 類別中已過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以建立對其進行驗證所使用的執行個體類別和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別中已過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以建立對其進行驗證所使用的執行個體類別和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 從傳回的所有節點指定`XmlReader`也會傳回從這個驗證讀取器，因此程序中不會遺失任何資訊。All nodes returned from the given `XmlReader` are also returned from this validating reader, so there is no information loss in the process. 這個讀取器 （例如，預設屬性和實體參考的子系），可加入新的基礎讀取器未傳回的節點。New nodes not returned from the underlying reader may be added by this reader (for example, default attributes and the children of an entity reference). 任何屬性上設定指定`XmlTextReader`也適用於此驗證讀取器。Any properties set on the given `XmlTextReader` also apply to this validating reader. 例如，如果提供的讀取器有 WhitespaceHandling.None 組，此驗證讀取器也會忽略空白字元。For example, if the supplied reader had WhitespaceHandling.None set, this validating reader also ignores white space. 當外部文件類型定義 (Dtd) 或結構描述所需的驗證，屬性集来用來解析外部資源的物件。When external document type definitions (DTDs) or schemas are needed for validation, the property sets the object to use for resolving external resources. ## Examples 下列範例會驗證兩份文件。The following example validates two documents. [!code-cpp[XmlValidatingReader.Cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.Cctor/CPP/valid_xsd2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlValidatingReader.Cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.Cctor/CS/valid_xsd2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlValidatingReader.Cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.Cctor/VB/valid_xsd2.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列的輸入的檔案：The sample uses the following input files: `notValidXSD.xml` [!code-xml[XmlValidatingReader.Cctor#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.Cctor/XML/notvalidxsd.xml#2)] `books.xsd` [!code-xml[XmlValidatingReader.Cctor#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.Cctor/XML/books.xsd#3)] `inlineXSD.xml` [!code-xml[XmlValidatingReader.Cctor#4](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.Cctor/XML/inlinexsd.xml#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別中已過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以建立對其進行驗證所使用的執行個體類別和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 這個建構函式會將指定的字串剖析為 XML 片段。This constructor parses the given string as a fragment of XML. 如果元素或屬性的 XML 片段，您可以略過的語式正確的 XML 文件根層級的規則。If the XML fragment is an element or attribute, you can bypass the root level rules for well-formed XML documents. 下表列出的有效值`fragType`和如何讀取器會剖析每個不同的節點型別。The following table lists valid values for `fragType` and how the reader parses each of the different node types. |XmlNodeTypeXmlNodeType|片段可能包含Fragment May Contain| |-----------------|--------------------------| |元素Element|任何有效的項目內容 （例如，項目、 註解、 處理指示、 cdata、 文字和實體參考的任何組合）。Any valid element content (for example, any combination of elements, comments, processing instructions, cdata, text, and entity references).| |屬性Attribute|屬性 （在引號內的部分） 的值。The value of an attribute (the part inside the quotes).| |文件Document|內容的整個 XML 文件。這會強制執行文件層級的規則。The contents of an entire XML document; this enforces document level rules.| 讀取器會使用下列步驟，以判斷資料流的編碼：The reader uses the following steps to determine the encoding of the stream: 1. 檢查屬性來判斷的編碼方式。Checks the property to determine the encoding. 2. 如果`Encoding`屬性是`null`，讀取器已檢查的資料流開頭的位元組順序標記。If the `Encoding` property is `null`, the reader checks for a byte-order mark at the beginning of the stream. 3. 如果`Encoding`屬性是`null`，並找到沒有位元組順序標記、 讀取器會假設資料流以 utf-8 編碼。If the `Encoding` property is `null`, and no byte-order mark is found, the reader assumes the stream is encoded in UTF-8. 如果這個讀取器會使用文件類型定義 (DTD) 驗證 (也就是設為 ValidationType.DTD 或 ValidationType.Auto)、`XmlParserContext`中指定建構函式必須提供所有必要的 DocumentType 資訊。If this reader will be validating using document type definition (DTD) (that is, is set to ValidationType.DTD or ValidationType.Auto), the `XmlParserContext` specified in the constructor must supply all the necessary DocumentType information. > [!NOTE] > 您不可能使用 DTD 驗證片段。It is not possible to validate a fragment by using a DTD. 定義 DTD 需要驗證載入整個文件。By definition a DTD requires an entire document to be loaded for validation. 如果使用 XML 資料精簡 (XDR) 或 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述，將會驗證這個讀取器，使用屬性來指定其中包含結構描述 (亦即`XmlParserContext`不需要提供DocumentType 資訊）。If this reader will be validating by using XML-Data Reduced (XDR) or XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas, use the property to specify the that contains the schemas (that is, the `XmlParserContext` does not need to supply the DocumentType information).

this enforces document level rules.| 如果這個讀取器會驗證使用文件類型定義 (DTD) (也就是設為 ValidationType.DTD 或 ValidationType.Auto)、`XmlParserContext`中指定建構函式必須提供所有必要的 DocumentType 資訊。If this reader will be validating by using document type definition (DTD) (that is, is set to ValidationType.DTD or ValidationType.Auto), the `XmlParserContext` specified in the constructor must supply all the necessary DocumentType information. > [!NOTE] > 您不可能使用 DTD 驗證片段。It is not possible to validate a fragment by using DTD. 定義 DTD 需要驗證載入整個文件。By definition DTD requires an entire document to be loaded for validation. 如果使用 XML 資料精簡 (XDR) 或 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述，將會驗證這個讀取器，使用屬性來指定其中包含結構描述 (`XmlParserContext`不需要提供 DocumentType資訊）。If this reader will be validating by using XML-Data Reduced (XDR) or XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas, use the property to specify the that contains the schemas (the `XmlParserContext` does not need to supply the DocumentType information). ## Examples 下列範例會讀取 XML 片段。The following example reads an XML fragment. 它會使用`XmlParserContext`及其處理命名空間相符。It uses an `XmlParserContext` and its to handle namespace matching. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別中已過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以建立對其進行驗證所使用的執行個體類別和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 網路的 XML 文件使用不同的全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 標準包含機制彙總的資料區塊組成，因此包含來自不同位置的節點。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated by using various World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. 文件類型定義 (DTD) 實體是一個範例，但這並不限於使用 Dtd。document type definition (DTD) entities are an example of this, but this is not limited to DTDs. 基底 URI 會告訴您這些節點的來源。The base URI tells you where these nodes came from. 如果是要傳回的節點沒有基底 URI （例如，它們從字串中剖析記憶體中），則會傳回 String.Empty。If there is no base URI for the nodes being returned (for example, they were parsed from an in-memory string), String.Empty is returned. ## Examples 下列範例會剖析檔案，並顯示每個節點的基底 URI。The following example parses a file and displays the base URI of each node. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 此範例會使用該檔案，`uri.xml`作為輸入。The example uses the file, `uri.xml`, as input. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example/XML/source.xml#2)] `style.xml`檔案包含 XML 文字``。The `style.xml` file contains the XML text ``.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別中已過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以建立對其進行驗證所使用的執行個體類別和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 讀取任何外部參考 （例如展開文件類型定義 (DTD) 檔案中的實體或讀取結構描述檔案） 時編碼屬性是設定的外部參考的編碼值。When any external reference is read (such as expanding an entity in a document type definition (DTD) file or reading a schema file) the encoding property is set to the encoding value of the external reference. 如果在外部參考中，未指定編碼方式，而且沒有位元組順序標記，預設為 utf-8。If encoding is not specified in the external reference, and there is no byte-order mark, this defaults to UTF-8. 支援所有基礎作業系統所支援的編碼標準。All the encoding standards that the underlying operating system supports are supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別中已過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以建立對其進行驗證所使用的執行個體類別和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 此屬性可讓您判斷下列各項目之間的差異：This property enables you to determine the difference between the following: `` (`IsEmptyElement`是`true`)。`` (`IsEmptyElement` is `true`). `` (`IsEmptyElement`是`false`，不過是空的項目內容)。`` (`IsEmptyElement` is `false`, although element content is empty). 對應`EndElement`的空白項目不會產生節點。A corresponding `EndElement` node is not generated for empty elements. 如果因為結構描述驗證的項目已加入預設內容`IsEmptyElement`仍會傳回`true`。If default content has been added to an element due to schema validation, `IsEmptyElement` still returns `true`. 它具有在項目具有預設值並無任何影響。It has no bearing on whether or not the element has a default value. 換句話說，`IsEmptyElement`只會報告是否來源文件中的項目有結尾項目標記。In other words, `IsEmptyElement` simply reports whether or not the element in the source document had an end element tag. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示每個項目的文字內容。The following example displays the text content of each element. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別中已過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以建立對其進行驗證所使用的執行個體類別和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節參考頁面...For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page.. 這個方法內容串流、 解碼 Base64 內容，並傳回解碼的二進位位元組 （例如，內嵌 Base64 編碼的 GIF 影像） 到緩衝區。This method streams the content, decodes the Base64 content, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline Base64 encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 這個方法可以連續呼叫來讀取內嵌文字的大量資料流。This method can be called successively to read large streams of embedded text. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準） 部分一個： 機制來指定，並描述網際網路訊息內文的格式 」。For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies". 您可以從註解網站，網址為要求取得 Rfc http://www.rfc-editor.org。You can obtain RFCs from the Request for Comments Web site at http://www.rfc-editor.org. > [!NOTE] > 您不應該存取的任何呼叫之間的讀取器屬性方法，直到該方法會傳回值為 0。You should not access any of the reader properties between calls to the method until the method returns the value 0. 此方法具有下列行為：This method has the following behavior: - 當它到達它所操作的位元組資料流結尾傳回 0 的值。 returns the value 0 when it has reached the end of the byte stream it was operating on. 讀取器第一個非內容節點上。The reader is positioned on the first non-content node. - 如果您尋求更少，或的確實數目，也會保留在資料流讀取位元組會保留在其目前位置。If you ask for fewer, or the exact number, of bytes than are left in the stream, the reader remains in its current position. - 不支援下列的 XML 節點類型： 項目、 XmlDeclaration，無、 文件、 DocumentType、 標記法、 實體和 DocumentFragment。 is not supported on the following XML node types: Element, XmlDeclaration, None, Document, DocumentType, Notation, Entity, and DocumentFragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別中已過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以建立對其進行驗證所使用的執行個體類別和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 這個方法讀取的項目內容中，使用 Base64 編碼方式，將其解碼，並傳回已解碼的二進位位元組 （例如，內嵌 Base64 編碼的 GIF 影像） 到緩衝區。This method reads the element content, decodes it using Base64 encoding, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline Base64 encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準） 部分一個： 機制來指定，並描述網際網路訊息內文的格式 」。For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies". 您可以從註解網站，網址為要求取得 Rfc http://www.rfc-editor.org。You can obtain RFCs from the Request for Comments Web site at http://www.rfc-editor.org. 這個方法可以讀取只有簡單內容的項目。This method can read only simple-content elements. 項目可以包含文字、 泛空白字元、 顯著泛空白字元、 CDATA 區段、 註解，以及處理指示。The element can contain text, white space, significant white space, CDATA sections, comments, and processing instructions. 它也可以包含實體參考，會自動展開。It can also contain entity references, which are automatically expanded. 項目不能有子項目。The element cannot have child elements. 這個方法是非常類似於只能在元素節點類型上呼叫方法，只是它。This method is very similar to the method except that it can be called only on element node types. 如果`count`值高於在文件中的位元組數目，或如果是，文件中的位元組數目等於讀取文件中所有剩餘的位元組，並傳回讀取的位元組數目。If the `count` value is higher than the number of bytes in the document, or if it is equal to the number of bytes in the document, the reads all the remaining bytes in the document and returns the number of bytes read. 下一步方法呼叫會傳回零，並將讀取器移至節點下。The next method call returns a zero and moves the reader to the node following the . 如果您呼叫已耗用所有的項目內容之前，讀取器可能如同所耗用的第一個內容，然後呼叫方法。If you call before all of the element content is consumed, the reader may behave as if the first content was consumed and then the method was called. 這表示讀取器會讀取所有文字，直到遇到結束項目。This means that the reader will read all the text until the end element is encountered. 它會讀取結束標記節點、 讀取的下一個節點，然後將其自身的下一步的後續節點上。It will then read the end tag node, read the next node, and then position itself on the next subsequent node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別中已過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以建立對其進行驗證所使用的執行個體類別和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 這個方法讀取項目內容、 使用 BinHex 編碼方式，將其解碼，並傳回解碼的二進位位元組 （例如，內嵌 BinHex 編碼 GIF 影像） 到緩衝區。This method reads the element content, decodes it using BinHex encoding, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline BinHex encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 這個方法可以讀取只有簡單內容的項目。This method can read only simple-content elements. 項目可以包含文字、 泛空白字元、 顯著泛空白字元、 CDATA 區段、 註解，以及處理指示。The element can contain text, white space, significant white space, CDATA sections, comments, and processing instructions. 它也可以包含實體參考，會自動展開。It can also contain entity references, which are automatically expanded. 項目不能有子項目。The element cannot have child elements. 這個方法是非常類似於只能在元素節點類型上呼叫方法，只是它。This method is very similar to the method except that it can be called only on element node types. 如果`count`值高於在文件中的位元組數目，或如果是，文件中的位元組數目等於讀取文件中所有剩餘的位元組，並傳回讀取的位元組數目。If the `count` value is higher than the number of bytes in the document, or if it is equal to the number of bytes in the document, the reads all the remaining bytes in the document and returns the number of bytes read. 下一步方法呼叫會傳回零，並將讀取器移至節點下。The next method call returns a zero and moves the reader to the node following the . 如果您呼叫已耗用所有的項目內容之前，讀取器可能如同所耗用的第一個內容，然後呼叫方法。If you call before all of the element content is consumed, the reader may behave as if the first content was consumed and then the method was called. 這表示讀取器會讀取所有文字，直到遇到結束項目。This means that the reader will read all the text until the end element is encountered. 它會讀取結束標記節點、 讀取的下一個節點，然後將其自身的下一步的後續節點上。It will then read the end tag node, read the next node, and then position itself on the next subsequent node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別中已過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以建立對其進行驗證所使用的執行個體類別和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 如果位於項目，`ReadString`串連所有文字、 顯著泛空白字元，空白字元及 CDATA 區段節點型別，並傳回串連的項目內容資料。If positioned on an element, `ReadString` concatenates all text, significant white space, white space, and CDATA section node types together and returns the concatenated data as the element content. 讀取器停止時遇到任何標記，包括註解和處理指示。The reader stops when any markup is encountered, including comments and processing instructions. 這可能會發生於混合內容模型中，或是讀取項目結束標記時。This could occur in a mixed content model, or when an element end tag is read. 如果文字節點上，位於`ReadString`執行相同的串連文字節點從至指定的項目結束標記。If positioned on a text node, `ReadString` performs the same concatenation from the text node to the element end tag. 如果讀取器定位於屬性文字節點上，則 `ReadString` 具有相同的功能，就像讀取器定位於項目開始標記上一樣。If the reader is positioned on an attribute text node, `ReadString` has the same functionality as if the reader were position on the element start tag. 它會傳回所有串連的項目文字節點。It returns all the concatenated element text nodes. 屬性會決定如何`ReadString`的運作方式如下：The property determines how `ReadString` works as follows: |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |ExpandEntitiesExpandEntities|傳回展開的字元和一般實體。Returns expanded character and general entities. 這是預設值。This is the default.| |ExpandCharEntitiesExpandCharEntities|傳回的文字內容，但不是包括一般實體參考。Returns the text content up to but not including a general entity reference. 這表示一般項目會導致 ReadString 停止。This means a general entity causes ReadString to stop. 您必須呼叫`Read`進入實體參考。You must call `Read` to step over the entity reference.| ## Examples 下列範例會顯示每個元素的文字內容。The following example displays the text content of each of the elements. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.IsEmptyElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.IsEmptyElement Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.IsEmptyElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.IsEmptyElement Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.IsEmptyElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.IsEmptyElement Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 此範例會使用該檔案，`elems.xml`作為輸入。The example uses the file, `elems.xml`, as input. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.IsEmptyElement Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.IsEmptyElement Example/XML/source.xml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別中已過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以建立對其進行驗證所使用的執行個體類別和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 例如，如果結構描述型別定義為`xsd:int`，執行階段型別`int32`傳回物件。For example, if the schema type is defined as `xsd:int`, the runtime type `int32` is returned for the object. 這可以使用測試方法，並轉換據此。This can be tested using the method and cast accordingly. 方法一律會傳回衍生自型別類別。The method always returns a type that is derived from the class. 永遠不會傳回型別。It never returns the type. 如果讀取器定位於屬性上，這個方法會傳回執行階段型別的物件，但不會變更讀取器的位置。If the reader is positioned on an attribute, this method returns the runtime typed object, but does not change the position of the reader. 如果讀取器位於項目，`ReadTypedValue`讀取任何 CDATA、 文字、 泛空白字元、 顯著的泛空白字元和註解節點會傳回執行階段型別的物件，並將讀取器放置在結束標記。If the reader is positioned on an element, `ReadTypedValue` reads any CDATA, text, white space, significant white space, and comment nodes, returns the runtime typed object and positions the reader on the end tag. 並沒有直接對應，例如任何型別`NMTOKENS`，會以字串形式傳回。Any types that do not have a direct mapping, for example `NMTOKENS`, are returned as strings. > [!NOTE] > 如果已設定 ValidationType.None，資料類型資訊不會提供從結構描述或文件類型定義 (Dtd)。If has been set to ValidationType.None, data type information is not provided from either schemas or document type definitions (DTDs). > [!CAUTION] > 在呼叫，`ReadTypedValue`會傳回`null`。After calling , `ReadTypedValue` will return `null`. ## Examples 下列範例顯示 XML 文件中的每個元素的類型資訊。The following example displays the type information for each of the elements in the XML document. [!code-cpp[XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType/CPP/schematype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType/CS/schematype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType/VB/schematype.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列的輸入的檔。The example uses the following input files. `booksSchema.xml` [!code-xml[XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType/XML/booksschema.xml#2)] `books.xsd` [!code-xml[XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType/XML/books.xsd#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別中已過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以建立對其進行驗證所使用的執行個體類別和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. `XmlSchemaCollection`儲存預先載入的 XML 資料精簡 (XDR) 和 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述。The `XmlSchemaCollection` holds pre-loaded XML-Data Reduced (XDR) and XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas. 這個屬性可讓讀取器存取的結構描述快取並允許它不需要每次重新載入結構描述驗證。This property gives the reader access to the cache of schemas and allows it to validate without having to re-load schemas every time. 讀取器不會加入任何項目`XmlSchemaCollection`。The reader does not add anything to the `XmlSchemaCollection`. 如果`XmlSchemaCollection`包含 XML 結構描述 (XSD) 包含`include`或`import`項目會參考其他命名空間的結構描述，這些命名空間已載入僅供驗證。If the `XmlSchemaCollection` includes an XML schema (XSD) which contains `include` or `import` elements that reference other namespaces, the schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 這些結構描述已明確加入至結構描述集合，除非它們將無法使用任何集合方法或屬性。Unless these schemas were explicitly added to the schema collection, they will not be accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. 例如，如果集合包含結構描述檔案`a.xsd`，其中包含結構描述檔案的參考`b.xsd`，您必須新增`b.xsd`結構描述集合才能使用任何集合方法或屬性加以存取。For example, if the collection contains the schema file `a.xsd`, which contains a reference to the schema file `b.xsd`, you must add `b.xsd` to the schema collection before you can access it using any of the collection methods or properties. 當`XmlSchemaCollection`使用存取`Schemas`屬性，方法會使用所指定屬性。When the `XmlSchemaCollection` is accessed using the `Schemas` property, the method uses the specified by the property. > [!NOTE] > 結構描述必須加入至`XmlSchemaCollection`在第一個`Read`呼叫。The schemas must be added to the `XmlSchemaCollection` before the first `Read` call. ## Examples 下列範例會驗證使用預存在於 XmlSchemaCollection 結構描述的三個 XML 檔案。The following example validates three XML files using schemas stored in the XmlSchemaCollection. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列五個輸入的檔案：The sample uses the following five input files: `booksSchema.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#2)] `booksSchemaFail.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#3)] `newbooks.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#4](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#4)] `books.xsd` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#5](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#5)] `schema1.xdr` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#6](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#6)]

summary.span: 設定事件處理常式，用於接收文件類型定義 (DTD)、XML-Data Reduced (XDR) 結構描述和 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述驗證錯誤的相關資訊。

span.span: Sets an event handler for receiving information about document type definition (DTD), XML-Data Reduced (XDR) schema, and XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema validation errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別中已過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以建立對其進行驗證所使用的執行個體類別和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 這些事件會在發生，而且只有當的 DTD，XDR 結構描述中，指定、 或自動為。These events occur during and only if a of DTD, XDR, Schema, or Auto is specified. 如果未不提供任何事件處理常式，則（嚴重性為等於 XmlSeverityType.Error） 的第一個驗證錯誤時擲回。If no event handler is provided, an is thrown on the first validation error (Severity is equal to XmlSeverityType.Error). > [!NOTE] > 如果項目回報驗證錯誤，不會驗證該元素的內容模型的其餘部分，不過，其子系進行驗證。If an element reports a validation error, the rest of the content model for that element is not validated, however, its children are validated. 讀取器只會報告指定的項目之第一個錯誤。The reader only reports the first error for a given element. 回呼處理常式可以使用保證，針對結構描述驗證 XML 執行個體文件的屬性。The callback handler can use the property to guarantee that an XML instance document is validated against a schema. `Severity`屬性可讓您區分 （嚴重性 XmlSeverityType.Error 等於），表示發生嚴重錯誤、 驗證錯誤和驗證警告 （嚴重性 XmlSeverityType.Warning 等於），表示沒有結構描述會提供資訊。The `Severity` property allows you to distinguish between validation errors (Severity is equal to XmlSeverityType.Error) that indicate a fatal error, and validation warnings (Severity is equal to XmlSeverityType.Warning) that indicate that no schema information is available. ## Examples 下列範例會驗證 XML 結構描述的檔案。The following example validates a file against an XML Schema. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列兩個輸入的檔案：The sample uses the following two input files: `notValidXSD.xml` (`xsi:schemaLocation`屬性會識別 XML 結構描述讀取器。)`notValidXSD.xml` (The `xsi:schemaLocation` attribute identifies the XML Schema for the reader.) [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example/XML/source.xml#2)] `books.xsd` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example/XML/source.xml#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別中已過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以建立對其進行驗證所使用的執行個體類別和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. `XmlResolver`用來載入任何 Dtd、 實體或完成驗證程序所需的結構描述。The `XmlResolver` is used to load any DTDs, entities, or schemas needed to complete the validation process. 這個屬性可以設定在任何時間和會影響下一步 後呼叫。This property can be set at any time and takes affect after the next call. 如果這個屬性設定為`null`，讀取器會假設使用者不想要在解析外部參考。If this property is set to `null`, the reader assumes the user is not interested in resolving external references. 在此情況下，讀取器僅驗證內部資源，如果資源不存在。In this case, the reader only validates against internal resources, if the resource is present. 1.1 版中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]，如果未設定這個屬性，應用程式的信任層級決定的預設行為。In version 1.1 of [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] , if this property is not set, the trust level of the application determines the default behavior. `Fully trusted code:` 讀取器會使用預設值不具使用者認證。`Fully trusted code:` The reader uses a default with no user credentials. 如果驗證才能存取網路資源，使用`XmlResolver`屬性來指定`XmlResolver`具有必要認證。If authentication is required to access a network resource, use the `XmlResolver` property to specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:` `XmlResolver`屬性設定為`null`。`Semi-trusted code:` The `XmlResolver` property is set to `null`. 不會解析外部資源。External resources are not resolved. 驗證時使用的結構描述，您可以藉由避免昂貴的載入程序使用屬性。When validating using schemas, you can avoid the expensive load process by providing an using the property. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`XmlResolver`屬性來指定存取網路上的 DTD 檔案的必要認證。The following example uses the `XmlResolver` property to specify the credentials necessary to access the networked DTD file. [!code-cpp[XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver/CPP/vrdr_resolver.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver/CS/vrdr_resolver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver/VB/vrdr_resolver.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列檔案做為輸入。The example uses the following files as input. `book5.xml` [!code-xml[XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver/XML/book5.xml#2)] `books.dtd` [!code-xml[XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver/XML/books.dtd#3)]
